|---|---|---|---|
| Feature Request | Suggest an idea or enhancement | Functional or technical enhancements | enhancement |

## Feature description
Describe the feature you would like to see.

## Problem it solves
Explain why this feature is useful.

## Proposed solution
Describe how you imagine this feature could be implemented.

## Alternatives considered
Any alternative solutions or features you considered.

## Additional context
Add any other context or screenshots.
